nodes.value: Protestas políticas
Political protests
Public demonstrations or actions by groups of people to express their disagreement or opposition to political policies or leaders.
The city center was filled with political protests against the new law.
Cambio social
Social change
Significant alteration over time in behavior patterns and cultural values and norms.
The invention of the internet brought about massive social change.
Organizarse
Organize themselves
To arrange or prepare themselves for an activity or event.
The students decided to organize themselves for the group project.
Comunidades en línea
Online communities
Groups of people who interact with each other primarily through the internet, often sharing common interests or goals.
Many gamers are part of large online communities.
Economía global injusta
Unfair global economy
An economic system that operates on a global scale but is perceived as having uneven distribution of wealth, opportunities, or power, leading to disadvantages for some.
Activists are protesting against what they call an unfair global economy.
Petición en línea
Online petition
A formal written request, typically signed by many people and submitted through the internet, appealing to authority with respect to a particular cause.
They launched an online petition to save the local park.
Firmas
Signatures
A person's name written in a distinctive way as a form of identification in authorization, especially at the end of a document.
The document needs 100 signatures to be valid.
Acosadores adolescentes
Teenage bullies
Adolescents who habitually seek to harm, intimidate, or coerce those perceived as vulnerable.
The school has a strict policy against teenage bullies.
Se hizo viral
Went viral
To become very popular very quickly on the internet.
The video of the cat playing the piano went viral.
Conmocionado
Shocked
Feeling surprised and upset.
I was shocked by the news of the accident.
Recaudar dinero
Raise money
To collect money, often for a specific cause or charity.
They organized a concert to raise money for the hospital.
Crear una fundación
Set up a foundation
To establish an institution or organization, especially one that is endowed with money for a specific purpose, such as charity or research.
After winning the lottery, he decided to set up a foundation to help local artists.
Detener el acoso
Stop bullying
To put an end to intimidating or coercing behavior, especially towards those perceived as weaker.
The school introduced new rules to stop bullying.
El cambio social ha sido muy importante para las protestas políticas.
Social change has been very important for political protests.
También ha sido importante para el cambio social en todo el mundo.
It has also been important for social change around the world.
Grandes grupos de personas ahora pueden organizarse rápidamente para protestar contra los gobiernos.
Large groups of people can now quickly organize themselves to protest against governments.
Utilizan los medios para mostrar al resto del mundo lo que está sucediendo.
They use media to show the rest of the world what’s happening.
Grupos como Occupy Wall Street construyen comunidades en línea.
Groups like Occupy Wall Street build online communities.
Estas comunidades intentan luchar contra lo que consideran una economía global injusta.
These communities try to fight against what they see as an unfair global economy.
McKenna Pope, de 13 años, vio que a su hermano menor le gustaba cocinar.
13-year-old McKenna Pope saw that her younger brother enjoyed cooking.
Quería comprarle un horno de juguete como regalo.
She wanted to buy him a toy oven as a present.
Ella buscó en línea, pero encontró un problema.
She went online, but she found a problem.
Solo podía comprar hornos de juguete diseñados para niñas.
She could only buy toy ovens designed for girls.
Decidió iniciar una petición en línea a los juguetes Hasbro.
She decided to start an online petition to Hasbro toys.
Les pidió que fabricaran hornos de juguete para niños.
She asked them to make toy ovens for boys.
En menos de un mes, su petición recibió 45.000 firmas.
In less than a month, her petition received 45,000 signatures.
Hasbro luego decidió cambiar el empaque de sus hornos.
Hasbro then decided to change the packaging for their ovens.
Acosadores adolescentes en Nueva York se filmaron haciendo llorar a su conductor de autobús escolar.
Teenage bullies in New York filmed themselves making their school bus driver cry.
Subieron el video a YouTube y se hizo viral.
They uploaded the video to YouTube and it went viral.
Max Sidorov, un hombre canadiense de 25 años, vio el video.
Max Sidorov, a 25-year-old Canadian man, saw the video.
Estaba conmocionado por ello.
He was shocked by it.
Inició una campaña usando las redes sociales para recaudar dinero.
He started a campaign using social media to raise money.
El dinero era para darle unas vacaciones a la conductora del autobús, Karen Klein, de 68 años.
The money was to give the bus driver, 68-year-old Karen Klein, a holiday.
Quería recaudar 5.000 dólares.
He wanted to raise $5,000.
Sin embargo, en tres semanas la campaña recaudó más de 600.000 dólares.
However, within three weeks the campaign raised more than $600,000.
Cuando Karen recibió el dinero, usó 100.000 dólares.
When Karen received the money, she used $100,000.
Creó la Fundación Karen Klein para intentar detener el acoso en toda América.
She set up the Karen Klein Foundation to try and stop bullying across America.
Así que, sea cual sea tu problema, usa las redes sociales.
So, whatever your problem is, use social media.
Ayudarás a personas que te ayudarán a cambiar el mundo.
You’ll help people who will help you change the world.
